# The `ShuffleVectorConstantExpr` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorconstantexpr">ShuffleVectorConstantExpr</a> - This class is private to <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/constants-cpp">Constants.cpp</a>, and is used behind the scenes to implement shufflevector constant exprs. <a href="#details">More...</a>
